solution.text:
\( \frac {1}{_{j}_} + \frac {-1}{_{k}_} + \frac {_{l}_}{_{{2*k}}_} + \frac {_{{k}}_}{_{{2*j}}_}\)
Making the denominators of all fractions common we get,
\( \frac {_{{2*k}}_}{_{{2*k*j}}_} + \frac {-_{{2*j}}_}{_{{2*j*k}}_} + \frac {_{{l*j}}_}{_{{2*j*k}}_} + \frac {_{{k*k}}_}{_{{2*k*j}}_}\)
= \(_{{Fraction(2*k -2*j + l*j+ k*k,2*j*k)}}_\)
\( \Rightarrow \) _{{trunc((2*Decimal(k) -2*j + l*j+ k*k)/(2*j*k),2)}}_
